name: SockMonster
description: You know those socks in your drawer, that lonely socks without pairs? Ever wondered what happenned to their other halves? Maybe if your memory is strong enough, you remember them going into your washing machine together but coming out all alone. That's exactly what happenned! Your home's very own special SockMonster ATE them! If you wanna walk in its socks for while and try feeding it yourself COME RIGHT THIS WAY! But, BEWARE no SockMonster eats socks in pairs!
